name: simple-release-action
description: A simple action to release projects with monorepo support.
author: Dan Onoshko <danon0404@gmail.com>

scripts.update-latest-branch: git checkout latest && git reset --hard main && git push origin latest --force && git checkout main
scripts.update-major-branch: git checkout v1 && git reset --hard main && git push origin v1 --force && git checkout main
scripts.update-branches: npm run update-latest-branch && npm run update-major-branch
